## lokalise2 payment-card delete

Delete a card

### Synopsis

Deletes a payment card from user cards.

```
lokalise2 payment-card delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --card-id int   A unique identifier of the card (required).
  -h, --help          help for delete
```
